Package cs2030.simulator

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
cs2030.simulator.Shop
public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
Shop contains all the servers.

  • Method Details

    • getServer

      public Server getServer​(int idx)
      Gets a server.
      Parameters:
      idx - Indicates which server to get.
      Returns:
      Server at that index.

    • update

      public void update​(int idx, Server server)
      Updates a server in servers.
      Parameters:
      idx - Indicates which server to update.
      server - New server to update to.

    • chooseServer

      public Server chooseServer​(double time)
      Scans through arraylist of servers and chooses one or none.
      Parameters:
      time - Arrival time of customer.
      Returns:
      A server if customer is to be served immediately or wait, otherwise null.

    • chooseServerForGreedy

      public Server chooseServerForGreedy​(double time)
      Same as chooseServer but caters to greedy customers.
      Parameters:
      time - Arrival time of customer.
      Returns:
      A server that has the shortest queue, or none if all servers all full.
